translation: v.服从；遵守；顺从；听从
examples: (1) Soldiers are expected to obey their orders without question.(2) We should obey the law.(3) The abbot told him to obey the rules.(4) We must obey the decencies and attend the funeral.(5) We agreed to serve your father and to follow his orders and obey his edicts.(6) Dogs can be trained to obey orders.
(1) 军人应当绝对服从命令。(2) 我们应当遵守法律。(3) 修道院院长告诉他要遵守规定。(4) 我们要遵照礼仪参加葬礼。(5) 我们很愿意服事你的父亲,遵行他的话,顺从他的命令。(6) 狗可以训练得听从命令。

translation: v.观察；遵守；注意到；庆祝
examples: (1) We have to observe carefully what's going on there.(2) All citizens should observe traffic rules.(3) We should observe the proprieties.(4) If they have to leave home, they must wear a face mask and observe good personal hygiene.
(1) 我们必须仔细观察那里的动静。(2) 每位公民都应该遵守交通规则。(3) 我们应该遵守礼节。(4) 若外出,要佩戴口罩,注意个人卫生。

translation: vt.获得；得到vi.流行；通用；存在
examples: (1) He failed to obtain a scholarship.(2) At last, their company obtained the mining concession.(3) Those who were penitent obtained absolution.(4) They obtained a loan from the government.(5) Please advise us immediately after you have obtained the necessary import license.(6) Your dress still obtains now.(7) The custom still obtains in districts.(8) The word has obtained general currency.(9) These laws no longer obtain.(10) These conditions no longer obtain.
(1) 他没有获得奖学金。(2) 他们的公司最终获得了采矿权。(3) 悔过者获得了赦免。(4) 他们从政府那里得到一笔贷款。(5) 你公司得到所需进口许可证后，请立即通知我们。(6) 你的这款套裙现在还很流行。(7) 这种风俗在某些地区仍然流行。(8) 该词已经通用了。(9) 这些法律不再通用了。(10) 这些条件已不复存在了。

translation: adj.明显的；显然的
examples: (1) It is obvious that she is very clever.(2) The embassy is an obvious target for terrorist attacks.(3) The merits of the scheme are quite obvious.(4) All great truths are obvious truths. But no all obvious truths are great truths.
(1) 很明显，她挺聪明。(2) 大使馆是恐怖分子攻击的明显目标。(3) 该计画的可取之处是相当明显的。(4) 所有伟大的真理都是显而易见的事实,但并非所有显而易见的事实都是伟大的真理。

translation: n.职业；占有；消遣；居住
examples: (1) I haven't entered your name and occupation yet.(2) Please state your name, age and occupation.(3) He is a merchant in occupation.(4) He returned from Paris and found his office was under someone else's occupation.(5) Riding is her favorite occupation.(6) The house was adapted for occupation.
(1) 我尚未记下你的名字和职业。(2) 请说明姓名、年龄和职业。(3) 他的职业是经商。(4) 他从巴黎回来，发现他的办公室被别人占了。(5) 骑马是她最喜欢的消遣。(6) 这所房子已被改造得可以居住了。

translation: vi.发生；存在；出现；想到
examples: (1) That plane crash occurred only minutes after take-off.(2) Misprints occur on every page.(3) A connection error might occur.(4) Didn't it occur to you that he was lying?
(1) 空难在起飞几分钟后就发生了。(2) 每页都有印刷错误。(3) 可能会出现连接错误。(4) 你当时没想到他在撒谎吗？

translation: n.大洋洲
examples: (1) Oceania is the smallest continent.(2) Oceania is a separate landmass,but it is separated from Asia by very shallow water.
(1) 大洋洲是最小的洲。(2) 大洋洲是一块单独的陆地，但它与亚洲之间只隔着很浅的水域。

translation: adv.表示状态的关闭或离开prep.离开；在 ... 之外adj.空闲的；离开的；关闭的v.离开；脱下
examples: (1) The singer was led off the stage by the maestro.(2) Off campus, they faced hostility.(3) The plane took off and ascended steadily until it was out of sight.(4) He forgot to turn off the gas torch when he left.(5) Please switch the lights off as you leave.(6) Make sure the central heating is off.(7) Boring! We should just off him and be done with it!(8) He pulled off his overcoat and began to work.(9) The girl peeled her sweater off over her head.
(1) 歌唱家由那位著名的指挥领着离开了舞台。(2) 在校园之外，他们遭人敌意。(3) 飞机起飞之后平稳地逐渐升空直到消失在视野之外。(4) 他离开的时候忘记关掉气焊焊炬了。(5) 你离开的时候请把灯关了。(6) 集中供暖设备一定要关掉。(7) 无聊!我们应该干掉他,这样一切就搞掂了。(8) 他脱下大衣，开始工作。(9) 小姑娘从头上把毛衣脱下来。

translation: n.犯罪；过错；攻击，冒犯；令人讨厌的事物
examples: (1) He was not aware that he had committed an offence.(2) In the eyes of law, it is an offence.(3) They were arrested for drug offences.(4) Such an offence will lead to a summary fine.(5) A fine for this offence is automatic.(6) The best defence is offence.(7) Whether a gun is a weapon of offence or a weapon of defense depends on which end of it you are at.(8) The new shopping centre is an offence to the eye.
(1) 他没有意识到自己犯罪了。(2) 在法律上,这是犯罪。(3) 他们因贩卖毒品罪而被逮捕。(4) 这类过错要当场予以罚款。(5) 对于这种过失,罚款是必然的。(6) 先下手为强/以攻为守。(7) 枪是攻击武器还是防御武器，要看你的目的而定。(8) 新购物中心很不顺眼。

translation: n.官员；高级职员；警官；军官；办事员
examples: (1) That officer must be removed.(2) He doubts if the officer is anybody.(3) The immigration officer stamped my passport.(4) His father was a senior officer at the bank.(5) He wore all the trappings of high officer.(6) At the sight of the police officer they run off.(7) The bullet hit the police officer in the shoulder.(8) Such an act of cowardice by an officer shames his whole regiment.(9) He's not an officer, but a common soldier.
(1) 那位官员必须免职。(2) 他怀疑这官员是个要人。(3) 移民官员在我的护照上盖了戳。(4) 他父亲是那家银行的高级职员。(5) 他佩戴着高级官职的各种服饰。(6) 一看见那些警官，他们便逃跑了。(7) 枪射中了警官的肩膀(8) 一个军官作出如此胆怯的行为使整个团都蒙受羞辱。(9) 他不是军官而是普通士兵。

translation: adj.正式的；官方的；公务上的n.官员
examples: (1) The group have split off from the official union.(2) I happen to have the official statistics with me.(3) They expressed their dissent from official policy.(4) He is a pompous official.(5) The mayor is a considerable official.(6) An official of the local government called to see him.
(1) 这一部分人已从正式的联盟中分裂出来了。(2) 我碰巧身边有官方的统计数字。(3) 他们对官方的政策表示出异议。(4) 他是个自命不凡的官员。(5) 市长是一位重要的官员。(6) 当地政府一位官员来看他。

translation: adj.近海的；离岸的；海外的adv.离岸地；近海地
examples: (1) Meizhou Island is an ofsfhore island.(2) The water quality of the offshore marine areas tended to improve.(3) The bluefin are fattened offshore in sea cages before being shot and butchered for the sushi and steak markets in Japan, America, and Europe.(4) Large sums are kept in opaque offshore centres.(5) The plane hit the ocean several miles offshore.
(1) 湄洲岛地处海陆边际。(2) 近岸海域海水水质呈改善趋势。(3) 在屠宰并卖到日本、美国和欧洲的寿司或者烤鱼片市场之前，这些金枪鱼被关在离岸的笼子中养肥。(4) 大量的财富都交由不透明的海外理财中心处理。(5) 飞机在距离海岸数英里处坠入大海。

translation: int.啊呀；哦
examples: (1) Oh, Xiao Fang, I didn't hear you come in.(2) Oh, she really is getting above herself!
(1) 哦，小方，你进来我都没听见。(2) 哦，她确实变得越来越自高自大了。

translation: n.油田
examples: (1) Design factors of oilfield heaters.(2) Karamay Oilfield is located in the western basin.
(1) 油田加热炉设计要素及技术发展。(2) 克拉玛依油田位于盆地西部。

translation: 奥林匹克运动会
examples: (1) The Olympic Games commands the attention of the world.(2) The Olympic Games begin with a parade of all the competing nations.(3) Which country will be the host country for the next Olympic Games?(4) Hotel accommodation was scarce during the Olympic Games.(5) Look! It's the start of the Olympic games!(6) Five cities in the world fought bitterly over the glory of hosting the2000 Olympic Games.(7) The Olympic Games are always televised.(8) In early days only male athletes were allowed to take part in the Olympic Games.
(1) 奥运会是举世瞩目的体育比赛。(2) 奥运会以参赛各国的列队行进开始。(3) 哪个国家将是下届奥运会的主办国？(4) 奥运会期间，旅馆房间很难找。(5) 瞧！奥林匹克运动会开始了！(6) 世界上有5座城市为申办2000年奥运会展开激烈的角逐。(7) 奥林匹克运动会一向经电视播放。(8) 在奥林匹克运动会早期，只有男性运动员才能参加比赛。

translation: n.煎蛋
examples: (1) Making an omelette is easy once you've got the knack (of it).(2) I can cook an omelette, and I can make coffee, but I can not bake bread.
(1) 一旦你掌握了煎蛋饼的技巧，做起来就很容易了。(2) 我会做煎蛋卷，而且我会煮咖啡，但我不会烤面包。

translation: pron.自己；自身
examples: (1) One can congratulate oneself on one's victories.(2) One should be strict with oneself.(3) How should my friend safeguard the rights and interests of oneself?(4) So video license plate is not all-purpose, important still is oneself superintend.
(1) 一个人也可以自己庆祝自己的胜利。(2) 一个人应对自己要求严格。(3) 我的朋友该如何维护自身的权益呢?(4) 所以视频牌照并不是万能的，重要的还是自身监管。

translation: n.开启工具；开端；揭幕赛；(板球的)首位击球员
examples: (1) Can you open the bottle with the opener?(2) For openers, we need to design invitations for the wedding.(3) For openers we'll get rid of this old furniture.(4) New York won its third straight postseason series opener.
(1) 你能用启子将瓶子打开吗？(2) 首先，我们必须为结婚设计请帖。(3) 我们首先要把这些旧家具搬走。(4) 纽约洋基队连续3年赢得他们季后赛的首场比赛。
1[N-COUNT 可数名词]See also:eye-opener；开罐器；开瓶器；开启工具 An opener is a tool which is used to open containers such as tins or bottles.   [usu n N]...a tin opener.开罐器

translation: n.开口；开始；张开；开幕；空缺adj.开头的动词open的现在分词.
examples: (1) He scraped through the narrow opening.(2) He put a gate across the opening in the fence.(3) The book's opening is dull, but the last chapters are interesting.(4) The establishment of the new China marks the opening of a new age.(5) Receptiveness was regarded as the time between flower opening and closure.(6) The opening of the exhibition has been postponed.(7) There's an opening for a plumber.(8) I'm trying to apply for an opening in an advertising firm.(9) His opening remarks are applauded by the audience.
(1) 他勉强钻过狭窄的开口处。(2) 他在围墙的开口处安了一个门。(3) 那本书的开始部分枯燥乏味,但最后几章很有意思。(4) 新中国的成立标志着一个新纪元的开始。(5) 自花朵开放到闭合的时间被看成是可受期。(6) 展览会开幕的日期延迟了。(7) 有一个铅管工的空缺。(8) 我正在申请广告公司的一个空缺职位。(9) 他的开场白受到听众的鼓掌欢迎。

translation: n.歌剧院；(尤指乡间的)剧场
examples: (1) She was once the best singer at the Paris Opera.(2) The design of the new opera house is ingenious.(3) The play is on in the People's House.(4) It is a mere 100 meter from my house to the theater.
(1) 她曾是巴黎歌剧院最好的歌唱家。(2) 这个新的歌剧院的设计真的是很有创意。(3) 这戏在人民剧场上演。(4) 从我家到剧场只有一百公尺。

translation: v.操作；运转；经营；动手术
examples: (1) It's too difficult for him to operate this new sophisticated machine.(2) The lift doesn't operate properly.(3) They operate three factories and a huge warehouse.(4) A large number of factories operate in the red.(5) The doctor began to operate on the boy.
(1) 对他来说,操作这台复杂的机器太难了。(2) 这台电梯运转不正常。(3) 他们经营三家工厂和一个大仓库。(4) 许多工厂都是负债经营。(5) 医生开始给那个男孩动手术。

translation: n.操作；运转；经营；行动；手术；运算；生效；（复）运筹学
examples: (1) The operation of this machine is simple.(2) I am skillful with computer operation.(3) We hope we will finalise the operation before the transfer window closes.(4) He calls himself the managing director but his company is just a Mickey Mouse operation that he runs from his own house.(5) Today, in order to meet the market competition, modes of business operation have undergone rapid change.(6) Life by the great dream, learn and change, due to the successful operation!(7) The gown a surgeon wears during an operation is usually green.(8) The surgeon has performed the operation.(9) Operation is conditional to the formulation.(10) In an addition operation, a number or quantity added to the augend.(11) The Department put into operation major reforms to the General Skilled Migration (GSM) programme with effect from 1 September 2007.

(1) 这个机器的操作很简单。(2) 我的计算机操作技术很好。(3) 我们希望在转会窗口关闭之前完成运转。(4) 他自称为总经理,但他的公司就是再他自己家里经营的一个微不足道的商号。(5) 今天,为适应市场竞争,经营方式正在迅速改变。(6) 人生因梦想而伟大,因学习而改变,因行动而成功!(7) 外科医生在做手术时穿的手术服通常是绿色的。(8) 外科医生做了手术。(9) 运算应符合公式。(10) 在加法运算中，加到被加数上的数或量。(11) 我局在技术移民审理方面做了很大的改革，从2007年9月1日生效。

translation: n.操作员；技工；管理者；报务员；【计】运算符
examples: (1) I am a computer operator.(2) The lathe is being adjusted by the operator.(3) My father is a private operator in civil aviation.(4) The telegraph operator was right.(5) Do you know the telegraph operator living over the way?(6) The radio operator sent out an appeal for help to headquarters.
(1) 我是一名计算机操作人员。(2) 这台车床正由技工在调准。(3) 我父亲是私营民航的管理者。(4) 报务员说的一点不错。(5) 你认识住在路对面的那个报务员吗？(6) 无线电报务员向司令部发出求救信号。

translation: n.意见；主张；看法；判断
examples: (1) I can't agree with your opinion in this respect.(2) I'd like to have your opinion on the 1995 World Expo.(3) Nixon may have been right in his judgment that there was no public opinion left to rally.(4) The end users rely on surveyors for sound judgement to arrive at an opinion about a ship and its equipment.
(1) 在这方面,我不赞同你的意见。(2) 我想听听您对1995年世界博览会的看法。(3) 尼克松认为已经剩不下什么公众舆论好争取了，他的这个判断可能是对的。(4) 最终用户正是依赖于检查员的合理判断来得出对船只及其设备的意见。

translation: v.反对；对抗；使对立
examples: (1) It was courageous of him to oppose his chief.(2) The rabbles met on the square to oppose their new mayor.(3) They opposed the government's new policies.(4) We're firmly opposed to the practice of powerpolitics between nations.(5) Who is opposing you in the match?(6) Don't oppose your will against mine.
(1) 他敢反对他的上司，真是勇敢。(2) 平民们在广场上集会反对他们的新市长。(3) 他们反对政府的新政策。(4) 我们强烈反对在国与国之间实行强权政治。(5) 你和谁比赛?(6) 不要把你的意志同我的对立起来。

translation: adj.乐观的；乐观主义的
examples: (1) The book ended on an optimistic note.(2) The stockholders are optimistic about the company's future.(3) We are still optimistic, whatever the result (may be).(4) I was exhausted and relieved, but I wasn't wildly optimistic.
(1) 该书的结尾寓意乐观。(2) 股东对公司的前景很乐观。(3) 我们仍然乐观，不论结果如何。(4) 我已感到精疲力尽,同时也感到如释重负,然而,我并不抱盲目乐观的态度。

translation: adj.任选的
examples: (1) The insurance cover is optional.(2) It is optional with you.(3) A 4-speed automatic transmission is optional.
(1) 保险范围可以随意选择。(2) 那是你的自由。(3) 四段自动变速器是可自由选择的。

translation: adj.口头的；口部的；口语的n.口试
examples: (1) The old man told us a story passed on by oral tradition.(2) We hurried an oral agreement before signing a formal contract.(3) He gave us an oral report after inspecting the factory.(4) Enteric viruses are able to enter in the body via the oral route.(5) He will take an oral examination.(6) John has got through the English oral test.(7) He failed the oral.
(1) 老人给我们讲述了一个口头流传的故事。(2) 在签正式合同之前，我们先草签了一份口头协议。(3) 视察了那家工厂后,他给我们作了口头汇报。(4) 肠道病毒是经口进入人体的。(5) 他将接受口试。(6) 约翰已经通过了英语口语考试。(7) 他口试不及格。

translation: n.势力范围；眼眶；轨迹vt.绕轨道而行；进入轨道vi.盘旋
examples: (1) Hou Kou district fell into Japanese orbit before the outbreak of the second sino-Japan war.(2) In the right orbit, an external ethmoidectomy was done, while in the left, a transnasal endoscopic approach was used to remove the inferomedial wall.(3) Conclusions For patients undergoing enophthalmos caused by a crepitant frature in orbit, it is the best way to perform an operation as early as possible.(4) The spacecraft is in orbit around the moon.(5) We can draw the earth's orbit round the sun.(6) The space shuttle will orbit a weather satellite.(7) Make one more orbit to the left again.(8) Avery's banked into a covering orbit while Byrne's plunged toward the restaurant.

(1) 虹口区在抗日战争爆发前就已落入日本人手中。(2) 两边皆以外侧眼眶切开术行外侧眼窝减压术合并内侧及部分眼窝底减压术。(3) 结论对于眼眶爆裂性骨折引起的眼球内陷可考虑早期手术，其效果优于晚期手术者。(4) 该航天器在绕月球轨道运行。(5) 我们可以画出地球绕太阳运行的轨迹。(6) 太空梭将把一个气象卫星送入运行轨道。(7) 左转弯再盘旋一圈。(8) 埃弗利乘坐的战机在空中盘旋掩护，班尼乘坐的战机则向饭店径直飞了过去。

translation: n.器官；风琴；机构；喉舌；报刊
examples: (1) The heart is a vital organ.(2) The old organ wheezed out a tune.(3) The organ played as the bride came down the aisle.(4) Parliament is an organ of government.(5) This paper is the official organ of the Communist Party.
(1) 心脏是维持生命必须的器官。(2) 那架老风琴呜呜地奏出曲子。(3) 当新娘沿着通道走过来时，风琴演奏了起来。(4) 议会是政府的一个机构。(5) 这份报纸是共产党的官方喉舌。

translation: v.组织；有机化；安排=organize（美）.
examples: (1) We will organise wine tasting parties for you.(2) I will hire that company to organise the gig.(3) I need to organise a driver for tomorrow.(4) Anticipate heavy business times and organise procedures.
(1) 我们可以组织大小中型的专业红酒品尝会。(2) 我要雇那家公司组织赛艇赛事。(3) 我得为明天的活动安排一个司机。(4) 能够预见餐厅生意的高峰期并安排行动。

translation: n.组织者=organizer(美）.
examples: (1) After the organiser gave maps to us, we start to go!(2) Organiser Graham Agg hailed it as a complete success.
(1) 组织者发给我们地图后，我们就出发了！(2) 组织者格雷厄姆盛赞这次的活动举办非常成功。

translation: n.机构；组织adj.有组织的
examples: (1) Our company is the epitome of a well organized, efficient organization.(2) They have established a student organization.(3) He's involved in the organization of a new club.(4) Organization of the company was then in a state of flux.(5) She is brilliant but her work lacks organization.
(1) 我们公司是一个组织完备、有效率的典範机构。(2) 他们建立了一个学生组织。(3) 他参与了新俱乐部的组织工作。(4) 当时公司的编制正处于不稳定状态。(5) 她很聪明,但工作缺乏条理。

translation: n.起源；出身；[数]原点；起因
examples: (1) The social unrest has its origins in economic problems.(2) He is a Dane by origin.(3) The family had its origin in Canada.
(1) 社会动荡是经济问题引起的。(2) 他原籍丹麦。(3) 这家祖上是加拿大人。

translation: adv.否则；不同地；在不同方面adj.不同的
examples: (1) Seize the chance, otherwise you'll regret it.(2) He should have been working, but he was otherwise engaged.(3) She is not very clever, but otherwise she's a nice girl.
(1) 抓住这个机会，否则你会后悔的。(2) 他应该在工作,可他却干别的事。(3) 她并不聪明，但在其他方面，她倒是个好姑娘。

translation: n.渥太华(加拿大首都)
examples: (1) Ottawa is the capital of Canada.(2) Ottawa cautions travellers to U.K.
(1) 渥太华是加拿大的首都。(2) 渥太华建议赴英旅游应慎重。

translation: aux.应该；应当；本该n.零
examples: (1) I don't think you ought to.(2) You ought to be more careful, you know.(3) The information ought to be made more accessible.(4) You ought to scrap the old bike and buy a new one.(5) You ought to treat these matter with candor.(6) He ought to have kept his promise.
(1) 我看你不应该。(2) 你应该小心一点，知道吗？(3) 资料应该明白易懂。(4) 你应该扔掉这辆旧自行车，买一辆新的。(5) 你应当公正处理此事。(6) 他原本应该遵守自己的诺言。

translation: n.结果；后果
examples: (1) What was the outcome of your meeting?(2) The outcome of the election is a foregone conclusion.(3) The outcome of the game is beyond his fondest hopes.(4) Public interest centres on the outcome of next week's by-election.(5) These complications may have a fatal outcome.
(1) 你们会晤的结果如何?(2) 选举结果已在预料之中。(3) 比赛结果使他大喜过望。(4) 公众的注意力集中在下周的补选结果上。(5) 这些并发症可能会有致命的后果。

translation: adv.在户外地；在野外n.户外；野外名词outdoor的复数形式.
examples: (1) There is intolerable noise outdoors.(2) Though it is cold, the children are playing outdoors.(3) Cuildren usually prefer playing outdoors.(4) I believe that this interest sparked my love for the outdoors.

translation: adj.外部的；外面的
examples: (1) This is compensated for an outer impressiveness.(2) But you can use a swab or cloth to clean the outer part of the ear.(3) The outer door opened.There stood Inspector Hornberg.
(1) 这一点由外部的感人情景得到了补偿。(2) 但是你可以用棉签或者布把你耳朵外面的部分擦干净。(3) 外面的门开了，霍恩伯格督学站在那里。

translation: adj.外向的；即将离职的；出发的
examples: (1) He is an outgoing and lively person.(2) My twin brother is more outgoing than me.(3) I was totally affected by this outgoing girl.(4) He is the outgoing chairperson.(5) She is the outgoing head of a large corporation.(6) Any outgoing ray path must be coincident with that of the returning ray.(7) Airports were closed to outgoing flights.
(1) 他是个性格开朗而又活泼的人。(2) 我的双胞胎兄弟比我更外向。(3) 我被这个性格外向的女孩子深深感染了。(4) 他就是那位即将离职的主席。(5) 她是一家大公司即将离职的负责人。(6) 任何出发的射线与返回的射线路径完全相同。(7) 机场取消了所有飞往外地的航班。

translation: n.郊游；远足；外出

translation: n.大纲；轮廓vt.概述；画出轮廓

translation: n.产量；输出功率；输出vt.输出(信息等)

translation: adj.直言无讳的；坦率的动词outspeak的过去分词.
examples: (1) He is an outspoken critic of the government.(2) His outspoken remarks made him an easy target for the opposition.(3) Uncle Frank is an outspoken man.(4) My boss is an outspoken critic of my ideas.
(1) 他是一个直言批评政府的人。(2) 他那番直言不讳的言语使他成了反对派的主要抨击对象。(3) 弗朗克叔叔是个坦率的人。(4) 我的上司总是对我的想法进行坦率的评论。

translation: adj.优秀的；突出的；未支付的；未完成的

(1) 他是个优秀的学生。(2) 如果有机会,约翰也许已成为一位杰出的画家了。(3) 在创建英国运河体系的过程中,有两件事是非常突出的。(4) 还有很多工作尚未完成。

translation: adj.向外的；表面的；外部的adv.向外；在外；表面

(1) 爆炸的瞬间会朝各个方向发出向外的压力波。(2) 霜是由冰的微晶组成，它生长在固体表面的外部。(3) 悲观的信念孳生了病态的痛苦，致使人类的内部极不和谐，从而使外部的繁荣毫无成果。(4) 那座破棚屋的墙向外倾。(5) 气缸中的蒸汽膨胀并推动活塞向外运动。(6) 马克在外表上没有现出沮丧的神色来。(7) 假如这次他能够同我一起重回北平的话，他会看到这个城市在外表上没有多大变化。(8) 霜是由冰的微晶组成，它生长在固体表面的外部。

translation: adj.卵形的；椭圆形的n.椭圆；椭圆形跑道

translation: adj. 奥林匹斯山的，奥林匹亚的；奥林匹克的
examples: The Olympic winner received a gold medal as an award.Hotel accommodation was scarce during the Olympic Games.Which country will be the host country for the next Olympic Games?The Olympic Games begin with a parade of all the competing nations.In early days only male athletes were allowed to take part in the Olympic Games.Five cities in the world fought bitterly over the glory of hosting the2000 Olympic Games.
奥林匹克的优胜者获得一枚金质奖章作为奖赏。奥运会期间，旅馆房间很难找。哪个国家将是下届奥运会的主办国？奥运会以参赛各国的列队行进开始。在奥林匹克运动会早期，只有男性运动员才能参加比赛。世界上有5座城市为申办2000年奥运会展开激烈的角逐。

translation: adv. 向前地；作用中，行动中；继续着prep. 向，朝……；关于；在……之上；在……时候adj. 开着的；发生着的，正在进行中n. (On)人名；(日)温(姓、名)；(缅、柬、印)翁
examples: The book is on the table.The spider is walking on the ceiling.I bought it on credit.He studied at Oxford on a Rhodes scholarship.What do you do on New Year's Day?He will give a lecture on international affairs.They made their own judgment on his report.Put your coat on.Why hasn't she got her glasses on?Move on!Time marches on.She worked quietly all night.He walks on down the corridor.The televisionw set was on.The light were all full on.The war was on then.There was a scare on about cancer.The night nurse is/goes on at 7pm.
书在桌子上。蜘蛛在天花板上爬行。这东西我是赊购来的。他靠罗兹奖学金在牛津就读。元旦你做什么？他会作关于国际形势的讲座。他们凭他的报告作出自己的判断。穿上你的大衣.她怎么没戴眼镜呢？向前走！时光流逝。她整个晚上默默地继续工作。他沿着走廊一路走过去。电视机开着。灯火通明。那时正在打仗。当时正出现恐癌症。晚班护士7点钟上班。

translation: adv. 一次；曾经conj. 一旦n. 一次，一回
examples: Once or twice she looked over her shoulder at me.She had not once spoken to him all the evening.I see them about once a fortnight.Once we lived in London.
有一两次她回头看看我。整整一晚上,她都没有跟他讲过一次话。我大约两星期见他们一次。我们曾经住在伦敦。

translation: pron. 一个人；任何人adj. 一的；唯一的n. 一num. 一；一个n. (One)人名；(老)温
examples: A person has one head and one neck.No one can live without breathing.If only problems would come one at a time!One should do his best for the cause of world peace.One always has to keep in practice.No one of you could lift that piano.One Smith is waiting for you in your office.
每人都有一个头，一个脖子。没有一个人可以不呼吸而生存。要是问题一次只发生一个该多好！一个人应该为世界和平事业尽最大努力。任何人都必须经常练习以求熟练。你们一个人谁也抬不动那架钢琴。一个名叫史密斯的人在你办公室等你。

translation: n. 洋葱；洋葱头
examples: I don't like the flavor of onion.This soup tastes strongly of onion.We had steak and fried onion for dinner.
我不喜欢洋葱的味道。这汤洋葱味太浓。我们晚餐吃牛排和炒洋葱。

translation: adv. 只，仅仅；不料adj. 唯一的，仅有的；最合适的conj. 但是；不过；可是
examples: This colt is only two months old.He had only a few coppers with him.You're only a child in his eyes.This is only an exercise in composition.His hair became gray when he was only forty.The news only reached me a moment ago.She says Italy is the only place to go for a holiday.Our only resort is to inform the police.He is the only survivor of the plane crash.Aubert was not only an artist of versatility, but he was also an outstanding sculptor.The book is likely to be useful, only it's rather expensive.Only bad weather can defeat us now.The merchandise is well made,only we can't use it.I can't possibly do that;I'm only flesh and blood.

这只小雄驹只有两个月大。他身边只有几枚铜币。在他眼里你仅仅是个孩子。这仅仅是一篇习作。他刚刚四十岁时，头发就变得灰白了。我刚刚得到这个消息。她说意大利是度假的最隹去处。我们唯一的办法就是向警方报案。他是那次飞机失事唯一的幸存者。欧贝赫是位才艺出众的全方位艺术家，更是一位杰出的雕刻家。这本书可能有用，只是相当贵。除非天公不作美，不然我们赢定了。这种商品做工精致,然而我们不能用。我干不了那桩事,我毕竟是人嘛。

translation: prep. 在…之上；对…了解；映射到…上adj. 映射的；自身的；映成的
examples: He grafted the branch onto the apple tree.Historically, wafers were waxed onto a metal plate.
他将这根树枝嫁接到了苹果树上。过去片子是用石蜡固定到金属板上。

translation: adj. 公开的；敞开的；空旷的；坦率的；营业着的vi. 开始；展现vt. 公开；打开n. 公开；空旷；户外
examples: The fresh air blew in from the open window.One day, I came home to find my garage open.She has fall asleep with an open book in her lap.I'm so sleepy that I can hardly keep my eyes open.How late are they open for skiing?Some of the royal palaces are open to the public.I'm not convinced your idea will work, but I'll keep an open mind for the moment.Their love affair is an open secret.The argument boiled over into open war.The dollar declined on the open market.These goods are to be procured through open tender.Can you open the bottle with the opener?Please open a window to allow the air to circulate.You may open a current account at a bank.Another supermarket opened last week.The shops usually open at nine o'clock.The story opens with a snowstorm.The book opens with a quotation.The Queen opens Parliament.In the summer, we camped in the open .All of his dealings are in the open.Now the scandal is out in the open, the President will have a lot of questions to answer.

新鲜空气从开着的窗户吹进来。有一天，我到家时发现车库的门是开着的。她睡着了,腿上还摊开着一本书。我睡意太浓，眼睛都快睁不开了。滑雪会开放到多晚？皇宫内有些地方是向公众开放的。我还没想通是否你的意见可行，不过我先考虑一下。他们的风流韵事是公开的秘密。争论演变成了公开的论战。美元在公开市场上下跌了。这些货物要用公开招标的方法购买。你能用启子将瓶子打开吗？打开窗子让空气流通。你可以在银行开立一个活期帐户。上星期又有一家超级市场开张了。商店一般在九点钟开始营业。故事以一场暴风雪开始。这本书以引语开头。女王宣布议会开会。夏天我们在户外野营。他的一切交易往来都是公开的。由于丑事已公开, 总统有许多问题要答覆。

translation: n. 歌剧；歌剧院；歌剧团n. (Opera)人名；(意)奥佩拉
examples: Have you heard the opera sung in French?Opera houses were packed out whenever she was singing.That opera singer has good lungs.The opera was quite stupendous.They planned to go to the opera this Sunday.
你听过用法语唱的这场歌剧吗？她一演唱剧院就满座。那位歌剧演员声音宏亮。这部歌剧很精彩。他们计划这个星期天去看歌剧演出。

translation: adj. 相反的；对面的；对立的n. 对立面；反义词prep. 在…的对面adv. 在对面
examples: She hurried away in the opposite direction.The fireplace flamed the opposite wall.Our points of view are at opposite poles.He came in and took a seat opposite to me.She starred opposite Jack Nicholson in Blood and Wine.They sat opposite at the table.There is a couple with a dog who live opposite.Vice and virtue are opposites.You are cold-blooded,she is the opposite.What I detest is that she always fancies me as her opposite.
她朝着相反的方向匆匆离去了。炉火照亮了对面的墙壁。我们的观点截然相反。他走进来，坐在我对面的座位上。她在《鲜血与美酒》中与杰克·尼科尔森演对手戏。他们面对面地坐在桌子两旁对面住着一对夫妇,他们养着一条狗。善和恶是对立面。你冷酷无情,而她恰恰相反。我讨厌她总是把我想象成她的对手。

translation: conj. 或，或者；还是；要不然n. (Or)人名；(中)柯(广东话·威妥玛)；(柬)奥；(土、匈、土库、阿塞、瑞典)奥尔
examples: You can send letters by mail or by hand.Is that painting an original or a reproduction?Which do you prefer, lamb chops or pork chops?Hurry up or else you'll be late.Don't rush at your work or you will spoil it.
你可以邮寄或者派人送信件。那幅画是原作还是复制品？你比较喜欢小羊排,还是猪排?快，否则你就要来不及了。不要匆忙地做你的工作，否则你会把它做坏的。

translation: adj. 橙色的；橘色的n. 橙；橙色；桔子n. (Orange)人名；(英)奥林奇；(法)奥朗热
examples: Would you peel me an orange?Which one do you prefer, an apple or an orange?There are some oranges on the table.The burning coals started to flame yellow and orange.The sun looked like an orange globe.The orange curtains jar with the red furniture.
你给我剥一个橘子好吗？你想要哪个，苹果还是橘子？桌子上有几个橘子。燃烧著的煤开始发出了黄色与橙色的火焰。太阳看上去象只橘黄色的球体。这橙色窗帘与红色的家具不协调。

translation: n. 命令；顺序；规则；【贸易】订单vt. 命令；整理；订购vi. 命令；订货
examples: Today we'll reverse the usual order of the lesson.The house had been kept in good order.An extraordinarily large order bucked up all the staff.The order urged the armed forces to enhance their alertness.Some teachers find it difficult to keep order in their classes.The social order of ants is very interesting.The rose and the bean families belong to the same order.He gave his order to the waiter.The commander ordered a counterattack.He ordered three new suits for himeself.I must have time to order my thoughts.I've ordered egg and chips for you.
今天我们将把通常的上课顺序倒过来。房子保持得井井有条。一份特大订单使全体员工欢欣鼓舞。该项命令敦促武装部队提高警惕。有些教师觉得课堂秩序很难维持。蚂蚁的社会结构非常有趣。蔷薇和豆类属于同一种类。他把他点的东西告诉服务员了。司令官命令反攻。他给自己定购了三套西装。我得找时间调整一下思路。我给你点了鸡蛋和炸土豆条。

translation: adj. 普通的；平凡的；平常的n. 普通；平常的人（或事）
examples: I just want an ordinary car without the frills.Now electrical appliances have entered into ordinary families.It was an ordinary lunch of soup and a sandwich.The inside of the house is rather ordinary.
我只要一辆没有多余装饰的普通汽车。现在家用电器已经步入普通家庭。那是一顿平淡的午餐:一份汤,一份三明治。房子的内部相当平淡无奇。

translation: adj. 其他的，另外的pron. 另外一个
examples: They discussed the weather and other topics.He overtook the other runners on the last lap.Problems always lead to other problems.My other sister is a doctor.He raised one arm and then the other.She stood on the other side of the fence.My office is on the other side of town.The children are always bickering about something or other.After her departure the others resumed the discussion.You can't get there other than by swimming.
他们讨论了气候和其他的话题。他在最后一圈时超过了其他的赛跑选手。有些问题总是连带着另外的问题。我的另一个妹妹是医生。他先举起一只手，然后举起另一只。她站在篱笆的另一边。我的办公室在市区的另一边。孩子们有事没事总是在争吵。她走之后，其余的人继续讨论你只能靠游泳游到那边去。

translation: n. 扣环int. 哎哟（突然疼痛时发出的声音）n. (Ouch)人名；(柬)乌
examples: Ouch! You hit my crazy bone.Ouch! The steam scalded my finger.
哎唷！你碰到我的麻筋儿了。哎唷!蒸气烫了我的手指头。

translation: pron. 我们的
examples: He enrolled our names.That's not our business.Our partnership dates back to (ie We have been partners since) 1960.
他把我们的名字登记下来了。那事与我们不相干。我们从1960年就合伙了。

translation: pron. 我们的n. (Ours)人名；(法)乌尔斯
examples: Your house is much bigger than ours.Their opinion jarred with ours.Ours is small.
你们的房子比我们的大多了。他们的意见与我们不一致。我们的是小的。

translation: pron. 我们自己；我们亲自
examples: We have a bathroom to ourselves.No one can degrade us except ourselves.
我们自己有一间浴室，不必和人共用。除了我们自己，没有人能贬低我们。

translation: adv. 出现；在外；出局；出声地；不流行地adj. 外面的；出局的；下台的n. 出局prep. 向；离去vi. 出来；暴露vt. 使熄灭；驱逐
examples: His book came out last month.He took out a book from the case.Students may not stay out after midnight.I went out into the cold and got a chill.The fire has gone out.The fuel was rapidly running out.They heard a yap and ran out of the house.He stared vacantly out of the window.Mr Green is out of town this week.The truth will out.I was outed by my wife.And the fire was outed.A crocodile cannot out its tongue.The tabloid article has outed a well-known politician.
他的书上个月出版了。他从箱子里拿出一本书。学生午夜后不得在外逗留。我走到户外的冷空气里打了个寒颤。火已熄灭。燃料很快就要用完了。他们听见了一声狂吠就跑出了屋外。他茫然若失地从窗子往外看。格林先生本星期不在伦敦。真相终将大白于天下。我让老婆给赶出来了。而且火也已经熄灭了。鳄鱼的舌头伸不出来。小报公开了一个知名政客的同性恋身份。

translation: adj. 外面的，外部的；外来的n. 外部；外观adv. 在外面，向外面；在室外prep. 在…范围之外
examples: The house is painted green outside.The outside of it looks all right.He has a rough outside but a good heart.One should not judge a thing by the outside.He isolated himself from the outside world.You must protect yourself from outside threats.He stood outside the house before going in.I find this purse in the street outside my house.
那房子外面漆的绿色。它的外观还可以。他外表粗鲁，但心地善良。不能从外表来判断事物。他把自己与外部世界隔绝了。您必须保护自己免受外部的威胁。他在进去之前曾站立在那屋子的外边。我在我的房屋外边的街上发现了这个钱包。

translation: adv. 结束；越过；从头到尾prep. 越过；在…之上；遍于…之上adj. 结束的；上面的vt. 越过n. (Over)人名；(俄、西、土)奥韦尔
examples: The lamp hung over the table.He sprinkled sugar over his cereal.He scattered his clothes all over the floor.He went to sleep over his work.We must go over the mountain.Cover her over with a blanket.By the time we arrived the meeting was over.Then the sun will rise on your left and pass over your head to set on your right.The dark red heavy curtain is falling down slowly, the music show is over.
那盏灯悬挂在桌子上方。他在麦片粥里撒上了糖。他把衣服扔了一地。他干着干着活儿就睡著了。我们必须越过那座山。给她盖好毯子.我们到达时，会议已结束了。然后太阳从你左边升起，经过你的头顶，从你的右边落下。暗红色的帷幔缓缓落下，音乐剧也演完了。

translation: vt. 拥有；承认vi. 承认adj. 自己的；特有的n. 自己的n. (Own)人名；(阿拉伯)奥恩
examples: But I can't hold on to my own principles, either.The writer has his own brand of humour.Children need toys of their own.He owns he was wrong.Nobody owned up to the theft.He would not own to knowing those persons.Do you own the house or are you a tenant?Someday, I will own a shop like this.
但是,我也没有能够坚持自己的主张。这位作家有他独特的幽默感。儿童需要有自己的玩具。他承认他错了。这件偷窃事没有人承认是自己干的。他不愿承认认识那些人。你是拥有这幢房子还是租住的?有一天,我自己将会拥有一间像这样的店。

translation: n. [经] 所有者；物主
examples: The property revert to its original owner in1998.She is not the true owner of this house.The stolen property must be restored to its owner.I am the rightful owner of this car.She is an obsequious shop owner.The store owner received satisfaction for the damage.
财产于1998年将归还原所有人。她不是这所房子的真正所有人。赃物必须物归原主。我是这辆新车的合法主人。她是个善于谄媚的店主。店主收到了对损坏的赔偿。

translation: 一定，当然
examples: That was 40 years ago, but of course you wouldn't remember it.Of course, if you provide a good pay.Of course, you shall put your best foot forward.I will write to you of course, but not every week.
那是40年以前的事，你自然想不起来了。如果你提供优厚报酬，那当然可以。你当然应该尽量给人留下个好印象。我当然会写信给你，但不是每星期都写。

translation: 平均；普通，通常
examples: We received 20 calls a day on average.This is their average yearly output.
我们平均每天接到二十通电话。这是他们每年的平均产量。

translation: 值班，上班（学校里）值日
examples: She's alerted me for weekend duty.He reported the murder to the police on duty.Experienced banquet waiters must also be on duty.It is time that you left for the duty.
她已通知我周末值班。他将凶杀事件告知值班警察。还必须让有经验的宴会服务员当班。该你当班了。

translation: 步行；在进行中
examples: We covered seventeen miles on foot.Pat looks better outside of a horse than no foot.
我们步行了十七英里。帕特骑在马上比步行更加神气。

translation: 展览着，在公开展出
examples: Some new types of cars are now on show.It sets the tone for the whole show.There are many exhibits on display in the museum.The fabric was displayed on a wired stand.
一些新型汽车正在展览。它决定了整个展览的气氛。博物馆里陈列著许多展览品。那种织物陈列在金属制的架子上。

translation: 按时，准时；按时付款
examples: To our astonishment, they arrived on time.He will come on time even though it rains.You must get to the station on time.The boss ordered that the work should be done on time.The rain kept us from getting there on time.We can depend on his arriving here on time.The child's parents were frantic when she did not return home on time.I couldn't have got to the meeting on time -- unless I had caught an earlier train.
使我们惊讶的是，他们准时到了。即使下雨，他还是会准时来的。你必须准时赶到车站。老板吩咐工作必须按时完成。那场雨使我们不能准时到达那里。我们可以相信他会准时到来。那孩子没有按时回家，她父母都要急疯了。我不可能及时赶到会场,除非我赶上了较早的一班火车。

translation: 再一次
examples: He failed again for all his pains.Facts once again give the lie to the fallacy.
尽管他费尽精力，还是再一次的失败。事实再一次揭穿了这一谎言。

translation: 再一次
examples: Facts once again give the lie to the fallacy.He asked once more if the jar was full.They had once again driven off the enemy's attack.Once more Yongxin shed some tears.
事实再一次揭穿了这一谎言。是否广口瓶是全部，他然后再一次问了学生。他们又一次击退了敌人的进攻。邓勇新又一次落下了眼泪。

translation: 从前
examples: Once upon a time there was a princess.Once upon a time, there was an old man living in a small village.
从前有一个公主。从前，在一个小村庄里住着一位老人。

translation: adv. 接连地；一个接一个地
examples: He rode roughshod over one opponent after another.They all go down like ninepins one after the other.
他把他的对手一个接一个地击败了。他们一个接一个地倒下去。

translation: 打开；开发；开始；展示，揭露
examples: You can open the can by pulling the tab.I opened the window after I got up.They decided to open up the island for cultivation.Is Open Source a Good Career Bet for Developers?The future will open out bright prospects for us.The universe is slowly yielding up its secrets.I believe he has started reading up anthropology.Let's start in and clean up the kitchen.We shall lay open all their secret plans.The newspaper loves to dig up scandals.To reform we need to continue to open up.The plant's first buds will open soon.
你可拉拉环把罐头打开。我起床后便把窗子打开。他们决定开发这个岛。开源是开发人员职业的一个好赌注？未来将为我们展现出光明的前景。宇宙慢慢地展现出它的秘密。我相信他已开始攻读人类学。咱们开始打扫厨房吧。我们将揭露他们所有的秘密计划。报纸喜欢揭露丑闻。改革需要继续开放。这植物的第一批蓓蕾即将开放。

translation: 否则；要不然
examples: Do more exercises or you will be out of condition.He can't be ill or he wouldn't have come.Step on it or we'll miss the beginning of the show.Otherwise, turn your jealousy on someone else!
多做锻炼否则你会身体不好的。他不可能有病，否则他就不来了。赶快，要不然我们会赶不上演出的。要不然，就把你的妒忌心转到别人身上去吧！

translation: 应该
examples: You ought to scrap the old bike and buy a new one.You ought to have a haircut.She failed one of the exam papers, but we ought to make allowance for the fact that she was ill.Regularity ought to be observed, as regularity is very conducive to health.China ought to make a greater contribution to humanity.He is a very good tennis player; you ought to see him in action.I think there's a train at 8.20 but you ought to make certain.I think you ought to go to/to go and see (ie consult) the doctor.
你应该扔掉这辆旧自行车，买一辆新的。你该去剪发了。她有一门不及格，但我们必须考虑到她当时有病。生活应遵守规律，因为规律对健康有益。中国应当对于人类有较大的贡献。他是个很好的网球运动员，你应当去看看他打球。我想8点20分有一班火车，不过你应该打听清楚。我认为你应当去找医生看看病。

translation: 喘不过气来，上气不接下气
examples: She was out of breath from climbing the stairs.
爬楼梯使她上气不接下气的。

translation: 发生故障；次序颠倒
examples: Let's try to straighten out this confusion.They live in a rough part of town.He'll soon grow out of wetting the bed.This is the batch of watches that all have the same fault.Engineer is trying to pinpoint the cause of the trouble.My boyfriend helped me repair the breakdown of my computer.
咱们努力收拾这个混乱的局面吧。他们居住在一个社会秩序混乱的城区。他大些就会很快改掉尿床的毛病的。这就是那批有同样毛病的手表。工程师们在设法找出故障的原因。我男朋友帮我修理了出故障的电脑。

translation: 失业
examples: He has been out of work for a year.The specter of unemployment haunted the land.The air conditioning must be out of order.We should find out an answer to the problem in two days.
他已经失业一年了。失业的恐怖笼罩全国。空调肯定是出问题了。我们要在两天之内找出问题的解决办法。

translation: adv. 一再地；反复不断地
examples: I've warned you over and over again not to do that.He reworked the first paragraph time and again.We will consider the problem over and over again.I've had to chase the Gas Company up again about the cooker.In this way the Freon could be used over and over again.
我一再地警告你不要去做。他一再改写第一段。这个问题我们还需再三斟酌。我不得不再三要求煤气公司派人来修理煤气炉。这样，氟里昂可以被反复不断地使用。
